Question
========

A person achieves a score of 8.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 11.3 with a standard deviation 2.8. The z-score of the person with 8.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -1.83
* -1.25
* -0.96

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.83: Incorrect
-1.25: Incorrect
-0.96: Correct
